metadata.dc:author: Alvarez-Rodríguez, Y
Briones-Carrillo, D
Valladares, Y
metadata.dc:description: A modification of the antiblastogram, a technique originally used for predictive anti-cancer drug testing, is employed in this work to select microorganisms producing antineoplastic antibiotics.
metadata.dc:title: Aplicación del antiblastograma para la selección de nuevas cepas de microorganismos productores de antibióticos antineoplásicos.
[Application of the antiblastogram in the selection of new lines of microorganisms producing antineoplastic antibiotics].
